verses.verse: (For the choir director; [set <S%H7682><s%> to] Al-tashheth. A Mikhtam of David, when Saul) (sent [men,] and they watched the house in order to kill him.) Deliver <S%H5337><s%> me from my enemies, <S%H340><s%> O my God; <S%H430><s%> Set me [securely] on high <S%H7682><s%> away from those who rise <S%H6965><s%> up against me.
Deliver <S%H5337><s%> me from those who do <S%H6466><s%> iniquity, <S%H205><s%> And save <S%H3467><s%> me from men <S%H376><s%> of bloodshed. <S%H1818><s%>

For behold, <S%H2009><s%> they have set <S%H693><s%> an ambush <S%H693><s%> for my life; <S%H5315><s%> Fierce <S%H5794><s%> men <S%H5794><s%> launch <S%H9075><s%> an attack <S%H9075><s%> against <S%H5921><s%> me, Not for my transgression <S%H6588><s%> nor <S%H3808><s%> for my sin, <S%H9128><s%> O Lord, <S%H3068><s%>
For no <S%H1097><s%> guilt <S%H5771><s%> of [mine], they run <S%H7323><s%> and set <S%H3559><s%> themselves against me. Arouse <S%H5782><s%> Thyself to help <S%H7122><s%> me, and see! <S%H7200><s%>

And Thou, O Lord <S%H3068><s%> God <S%H430><s%> of hosts, <S%H6635><s%> the God <S%H430><s%> of Israel, <S%H3478><s%> Awake <S%H9516><s%> to punish <S%H6485><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> the nations; <S%H1471><s%> Do not be gracious <S%H2603><s%> to any <S%H3605><s%> [who are] treacherous <S%H898><s%> in iniquity. <S%H205><s%> Selah. <S%H5542><s%>
They return <S%H7725><s%> at evening, <S%H6153><s%> they howl <S%H1993><s%> like a dog, <S%H3611><s%> And go <S%H5437><s%> around <S%H5437><s%> the city. <S%H5892><s%>

Behold, <S%H2009><s%> they belch <S%H5042><s%> forth <S%H5042><s%> with their mouth; <S%H6310><s%> Swords <S%H2719><s%> are in their lips, <S%H8193><s%> For, [they say,] "Who <S%H4310><s%> hears <S%H8085><s%>?"
But Thou, O Lord, <S%H3068><s%> dost laugh <S%H7832><s%> at them; Thou dost scoff <S%H3932><s%> at all <S%H3605><s%> the nations. <S%H1471><s%>
[Because of] his strength <S%H5797><s%> I will watch <S%H8104><s%> for Thee, For God <S%H430><s%> is my stronghold. <S%H4869><s%>
My God <S%H430><s%> in His lovingkindness <S%H2617><s%> will meet <S%H6923><s%> me; God <S%H430><s%> will let me look <S%H7200><s%> [triumphantly] upon my foes. <S%H9596><s%>

Do not slay <S%H2026><s%> them, lest <S%H6435><s%> my people <S%H5971><s%> forget; <S%H7911><s%> Scatter <S%H5128><s%> them by Thy power, <S%H2428><s%> and bring <S%H3381><s%> them down, <S%H3381><s%> O Lord, <S%H136><s%> our shield. <S%H4043><s%>

[On account <S%H4480><s%> of] the sin <S%H9128><s%> of their mouth <S%H6310><s%> [and] the words <S%H1697><s%> of their lips, <S%H8193><s%> Let them even be caught <S%H3920><s%> in their pride, <S%H1347><s%> And on account of curses <S%H423><s%> and lies <S%H3585><s%> which they utter. <S%H5608><s%>

Destroy <S%H3615><s%> [them] in wrath, <S%H2534><s%> destroy <S%H3615><s%> [them], that they may be no <S%H369><s%> more; <S%H369><s%> That [men] may know <S%H3045><s%> that God <S%H430><s%> rules <S%H4910><s%> in Jacob, <S%H3290><s%> To the ends <S%H657><s%> of the earth. <S%H776><s%> Selah. <S%H5542><s%>
And they return <S%H7725><s%> at evening, <S%H6153><s%> they howl <S%H1993><s%> like a dog, <S%H3611><s%> And go <S%H5437><s%> around <S%H5437><s%> the city. <S%H5892><s%>
They wander <S%H5128><s%> about for food, <S%H398><s%> And growl <S%H9235><s%> if <S%H518><s%> they are not satisfied. <S%H7646><s%>

But as for me, I shall sing <S%H7891><s%> of Thy strength; <S%H5797><s%> Yes, I shall joyfully <S%H7442><s%> sing <S%H7442><s%> of Thy lovingkindness <S%H2617><s%> in the morning, <S%H1242><s%> For Thou hast been <S%H1961><s%> my stronghold, <S%H4869><s%> And a refuge <S%H4498><s%> in the day <S%H3117><s%> of my distress. <S%H9496><s%>

O my strength, <S%H5797><s%> I will sing <S%H2167><s%> praises <S%H2167><s%> to Thee; For God <S%H430><s%> is my stronghold, <S%H4869><s%> the God <S%H430><s%> who shows me lovingkindness. <S%H2617><s%>
